achieve.subtitle: WHY DEEPWEB?
achieve.title: What You'll Achieve by This Book

achieveItem.title: Motivation
achieveItem.description: “Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.”

achieveItem.title: Experience
achieveItem.description: “Movements have narratives. They tell stories.because they are not just about rearranging economics and politics. They also rearrange meaning. And they're not about figuring out what is good.”

achieveItem.title: Goals
achieveItem.description: “If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy and inspires your hopes.”

achieveItem.title: Vision
achieveItem.description: “Cultivate your ability to learn from life's rich patterns. You may not be able to establish the curriculum, but you can elect what courses to take at any given time and how to apply your knowledge.”
